name: wiz-io
label: Wiz.io
description: Wiz provides a comprehensive analysis engine that integrates: Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) Kubernetes Security Posture Management (KSPM) Cloud Workload Protection (CWPP) + vulnerability management. Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) scanning.

fields.title: API Endpoint URL
fields.name: aPIEndpointURL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Wiz.io server to connect and perform automated operations. Provide the API endpoint URL for the GraphQL API. The format is as follow: https://api.your-server-location-here.app.wiz.io
fields.tooltip:
Provide the API endpoint URL for the GraphQL API. The format is as follow: https://api.<location>.app.wiz.io
The "location" value and the URL can be retrieved from the WIZ tenant settings.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: clientID
fields.description: Specify the API Client ID generated in the service account of the WIZ deployment to access the Wiz.io server.
fields.tooltip: Provide the API Client ID generated in the service account of the WIZ deployment.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: clientSecret
fields.description: Specify the API Client Secret generated in the service account of the WIZ deployment to access the Wiz.io server.
fields.tooltip: Provide the API Client Secret generated in the service account of the WIZ deployment.

fields.title: Authentication Endpoint URL
fields.name: authenticationEndpointURL
fields.description: Specify the URL from which to retrieve OAuth token. The URL can be found at the Service Account page of the Wiz.io server.
fields.tooltip: URL which is used to retrieve OAuth Token from. The URL can be found at the Service Account page.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Issues
operations.description: Gets issues  from Wiz.io based on the defined filter and maximum results limit that you have specified.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Use as a pagination argument to refine your query. Possible values: 1-500.

parameters.title: Issue ID
parameters.name: issueID
parameters.tooltip: Filter Issues matching these ID.

parameters.title: Search Query
parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.tooltip: Free text search on Issue title or object name. Returns NULL if no match is found.

parameters.title: Project ID
parameters.name: projectID
parameters.tooltip: Filter Issues from specific projects according to the project ID.

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.name: severity
parameters.tooltip: Filter Issues by the Control severity.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Filter Issues by their current status.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Filter by Issue type.

parameters.title: Related Entity ID
parameters.name: relatedEntityID
parameters.tooltip: Filter Issues by a specific entity ID.

parameters.title: Realted Entity Type
parameters.name: realtedEntityType
parameters.tooltip: Filter Issues by a specific entity type.

parameters.title: Created before
parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.tooltip: This object contains Issues date filters to narrow down your results. Use to return Issues that were created before the specified date period.

parameters.title: Created after
parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.tooltip: This object contains Issues date filters to narrow down your results. Use to return Issues that were created after the specified date period.

parameters.title: Resolved before
parameters.name: resolvedBefore
parameters.tooltip: This object contains Issues date filters to narrow down your results. Use to return Issues that were resolved before the specified date period.

parameters.title: Resolved after
parameters.name: resolvedAfter
parameters.tooltip: This object contains Issues date filters to narrow down your results. Use to return Issues that were resolved after the specified date period.

parameters.title: Pagination
parameters.name: pagination
parameters.tooltip: Use as a pagination argument to refine your query. Use the Value from the "after" parameter in the previous result.

parameters.title: Related Cloud Platform
parameters.name: relatedCloudPlatform
parameters.tooltip: Filter Issues by cloud platform.

operations.title: Get Inventory Assets
operations.description: Get inventory assets from Wiz.io platform based on the Project ID and other filter criteria that you have specified.

parameters.title: Project ID
parameters.name: projectID
parameters.tooltip: Provide a project id from which the assets should be gathered. Keep the wildcard to allow all projects to be included.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Filter cloud resources by specific entity types. You can specify multiple values in an array. Entity types must be specified in ALL_CAPS format. List of types: https://win.wiz.io/docs/security-graph-object-normalization

parameters.title: Search Term
parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.tooltip: Filter by free text search on cloud resource name.

parameters.title: Updated before
parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.tooltip: This object contains cloud resource date filters to narrow down your report results. Use to return cloud resources that were created or updated in the specified date period. DateTime format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.title: Updated after
parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.tooltip: This object contains cloud resource date filters to narrow down your report results. Use to return cloud resources that were created or updated in the specified date period. DateTime format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.title: Deleted before
parameters.name: deletedBefore
parameters.tooltip: This object contains cloud resource date filters to narrow down your report results. Use to return cloud resources that were deleted in the specified date period. DateTime format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.title: Deleted after
parameters.name: deletedAfter
parameters.tooltip: This object contains cloud resource date filters to narrow down your report results. Use to return cloud resources that were deleted in the specified date period. DateTime format: yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Limit the results by the amount provided. Will automatically enable pagination.

operations.title: Get Projects
operations.description: Get a list of projects and settings based on the filter query and maximum results limit that you have specified.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Filter by Project name.

parameters.title: Business Impact
parameters.name: businessImpact
parameters.tooltip: Filter by business impact

parameters.title: Include Archived Projects
parameters.name: includeArchivedProjects
parameters.tooltip: Filter Projects that are/are not archived.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Limit the results by the amount provided. Will automatically enable pagination.

operations.title: Add Comment to Issue
operations.description: Add a comment to an existing issue within Wiz.io based on the issue ID and the comment that you have specified.

parameters.title: Issue ID
parameters.name: issueID
parameters.tooltip: ID of the issue where a comment should be added.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: Comment message to add to a issue.

operations.title: Get Vulnerabilities
operations.description: Get vulnerabilities from Wiz.io based on the Asset ID, Project ID, and other filter criteria that you have specified.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status to get the vulnerabilities from Wiz.io. Filter by finding status.

parameters.title: Vulnerability ID
parameters.name: vulnerabilityID
parameters.tooltip: Filter vulnerability findings matching these IDs. You can specify multiple values in an array.

parameters.title: External Subscription ID
parameters.name: externalSubscriptionID
parameters.tooltip: Filter vulnerability findings from these external subscription IDs (AWS Account, Azure Subscription, GCP Project, and OCI Compartment). You can specify multiple values in an array.

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.name: severity
parameters.tooltip: Filter by vulnerability vendor severity.

parameters.title: First Seen before
parameters.name: firstSeenBefore
parameters.tooltip: This object contains vulnerability date filters to narrow down your query's results. Use to return vulnerability findings that were created (first detected) in the specified date period. Format: 2022-12-03T10:15:30Z

parameters.title: First Seen after
parameters.name: firstSeenAfter
parameters.tooltip: This object contains vulnerability date filters to narrow down your query's results. Use to return vulnerability findings that were created (first detected) in the specified date period. Format: 2022-12-03T10:15:30Z

parameters.title: Resolved before
parameters.name: resolvedBefore
parameters.tooltip: This object contains vulnerability date filters to narrow down your query's results. Use to return vulnerability findings that were resolved in the specified date period. Format: 2022-12-03T10:15:30Z

parameters.title: Resolved after
parameters.name: resolvedAfter
parameters.tooltip: This object contains vulnerability date filters to narrow down your query's results. Use to return vulnerability findings that were resolved in the specified date period. Format: 2022-12-03T10:15:30Z

parameters.title: Project ID
parameters.name: projectID
parameters.tooltip: Filter only vulnerability findings for the given projects. You can specify multiple values in an array.

parameters.title: Asset ID
parameters.name: assetID
parameters.tooltip: Filter only vulnerability findings on these asset IDs.

parameters.title: Asset Type
parameters.name: assetType
parameters.tooltip:
The asset type return in your query. You can specify multiple values as a separated list.
Possible values: "VIRTUAL_MACHINE", "CONTAINER_IMAGE","CONTAINER", "SERVERLESS".

parameters.title: Patch available
parameters.name: patchAvailable
parameters.tooltip: Filter only vulnerability findings for vulnerabilities with an available fix.

parameters.title: Exploit available
parameters.name: exploitAvailable
parameters.tooltip: Filter only vulnerability findings for vulnerabilities with an available exploit.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Limit the results by the amount provided. Will automatically enable pagination. Values can be from 1 - 5000.

parameters.title: Pagination
parameters.name: pagination
parameters.tooltip: Use as a pagination argument to refine your query. Use the Value from the "after" parameter in the previous result.
